snippet: Samaria Rice expressed frustration that her son had been shot by the police on Nov. 22, but that the investigation was still continuing.
abstract: Samaria Rice pleads for Cuyahoga County Sheriff’s Department to conclude criminal inquiry into death of her son Tamir Rice that has gone on for months: 12-year-old was fatally shot by Cleveland Police Officer Tim Loehmann while playing with fake pistol in a local park.
lead_paragraph: Samaria Rice expressed frustration that her son had been shot by the police on Nov. 22, but that the investigation was still continuing.

headline.main: Tamir Rice’s Mother Asks Ohio Authorities to Finish Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Mother of Cleveland Boy Killed by the Police Urges Speedy Conclusion to Inquiry
